content: skill level easy/ intermediate the pattern requires basic crochet knowledge you should be familiar with - magic_ring - single_crochet - double_crochet - half_double_crochet - triple crochet - increase - decrease - slip_stitch materials you will need - worsted weight yarn in lavender and aqua blue colour - 3 5 mm crochet hook or the size you need depending on yarn you use - polyester stuffing - 8 mm safety eyes - tapestry needle size the finished doll measures around 4 75 inches 12cm wide and 2 75 inches 7 cm tall you are welcome to use any yarn of different thickness the sizes may vary according to the yarn and hook you use hope you will enjoy crocheting this cute little elephant as much as i did
